step_name: Include transcript path in crash recovery suggestions
description: Enhance crash recovery suggestions with specific transcript file path for debugging agent behavior. Implementation: Accept transcript_path parameter in recovery suggestion generation; Include path in at least one WHY suggestion (evidence of error); Format as actionable reference: 'Check agent transcript at {path}'. Example: 'Check agent transcript at /tmp/transcripts/session-12345.log for specific error details that prevented phase completion.' Integration Points: SubagentStop hook receives transcript_path; Pass to RecoveryGuidanceHandler.handle_failure(); Persist path reference in step file for future reference
acceptance_criteria: Transcript path included in recovery suggestions; Path is specific and absolute (not generic); Path is formatted as actionable reference; Path persists in step file JSON
